title: Successful login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using valid username and password, and is redirected to the correct dashboard based on role.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username and password
Click the login button
Verify that login is successful and user is taken to their respective dashboard (Farmer or Admin)

title: Login failure with incorrect credentials
description: Verify that providing incorrect login credentials displays appropriate error messages and prevents access.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username or password
Click the login button
Verify an error message is shown and access is denied

title: Role-based access control enforcement
description: Verify that users with different roles (Farmer, Admin) have access only to allowed modules and UI elements.

steps.description: Log in as Farmer
Verify Farmer dashboard and menus are displayed, Admin-only features are hidden
Log out and login as Admin
Verify Admin dashboard and full management features are accessible

title: Real-time dashboard sensor and device status display
description: Verify that the dashboard displays real-time sensor data and device statuses and updates over time dynamically.

steps.description: Log in as Farmer
Verify real-time sensor readings, device statuses, and farm maps are shown accurately
Verify floating action button (FAB) is present and functional for quick actions

title: Device management: view, filter, search, and pagination
description: Verify device list loads with card and table views, supports filtering, search, and pagination.

steps.description: Navigate to Devices management page
Verify devices load with both card and table views
Use search input with partial and full device names
Verify search results update correctly
Apply filters by device status and type
Verify filtered results match criteria
Navigate through pagination controls
Verify pages load correctly and data updates

title: Bulk operations and export in device management
description: Verify that users can select multiple devices to perform bulk enable/disable actions and export device data successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to Devices management page
Select multiple devices using bulk selection
Perform bulk enable/disable action
Verify all selected devices have their statuses updated accordingly
Use export function to export device list data
Verify exported file contains correct and complete device data

title: Sensor readings visualization with auto-refresh and virtual scrolling
description: Verify sensor readings display realistic data with charts, support virtual scrolling, and refresh automatically.

steps.description: Navigate to Sensor Readings module
Verify sensor data visualized with charts and color codings
Scroll through sensor list to trigger virtual scrolling
Verify smooth rendering of sensors loading/unloading
Verify sensor readings refresh automatically as new data arrives

title: Manual control and action logging
description: Verify users can manually control equipment, see real-time action streams, and view detailed recent action histories.

steps.description: Navigate to Actions/Automation module
Perform a manual control action on an equipment device
Verify action is executed and reflected immediately
Verify real-time action stream updates with the new action
Open action details dialog for a previous action
Verify detailed information of the action is displayed correctly

title: Notification system real-time alerts and management
description: Verify push notifications arrive in real-time with WebSocket, users can read, delete, mark as read in the Notification Center.

steps.description: Trigger an alert event from backend (simulate IoT alert)
Verify notification toast appears in real-time
Open Notification Center
Mark a notification as read
Verify notification state updates to read
Delete a notification
Verify notification is removed from the list

title: Multi-language UI support and RTL layout
description: Verify UI languages dynamically switch between English, Arabic (with RTL layout), and French with proper translations and layout adjustments.

steps.description: In UI settings or language switcher, select Arabic language
Verify UI texts translate to Arabic and layout switches to RTL
Switch language to French
Verify UI texts translate to French and layout is LTR
Switch language back to English
Verify UI returns to English texts and default LTR layout

title: Dark and light theme toggle with consistent UI styling
description: Verify toggling between dark and light themes changes the UI styling consistently across all components respecting the glassmorphism and neumorphism design.

steps.description: Toggle application theme to dark mode
Verify all UI components reflect the dark theme styling consistently
Toggle back to light mode
Verify all UI components reflect the light theme styling consistently

title: Profile management: personal info edit and password change
description: Verify users can update their personal profile data and securely change their password.

steps.description: Navigate to user profile module
Edit personal information fields and save
Verify updated data persists and displays correctly
Change password with current and new passwords
Verify password change confirmation and login with new password success

title: API error handling and authentication interceptor
description: Verify that all API calls handle server errors gracefully, authentication tokens are attached properly, and unauthorized access redirects to login.

steps.description: Trigger API call with expired or missing JWT token
Verify user is redirected to login page
Trigger API call with server error (e.g., 500 status)
Verify user-friendly error message is displayed without breaking the UI

title: Shared UI components presence and consistency
description: Verify common UI components such as headers, footers, language switchers, floating action buttons, and loading screens render correctly and maintain style consistency.

steps.description: Navigate through multiple application pages
Verify header and footer are consistently displayed
Verify language switcher works and appears in expected places
Verify global floating action buttons are present where expected
Verify loading screens show during async data fetching

title: Notification preferences configuration
description: Verify users can configure notification settings such as enable/disable alert categories and notification methods.

steps.description: Open Settings and navigate to Notification Preferences
Toggle notification categories on or off
Save changes
Verify notifications respect the configured preferences in real-time

title: Farm management: create, edit, and delete farms
description: Verify that users can create new farms, edit existing farm details, and delete farms with confirmation.

steps.description: Navigate to Farms management page
Create a new farm with valid data
Verify the new farm appears in the list
Edit an existing farm's details and save changes
Verify the edited details are updated correctly
Delete a farm after confirming the action
Verify the farm is no longer listed

title: Search and filter functionality in farms and devices with no results
description: Verify that searches and filters yielding no results display appropriate user feedback and UI states.

steps.description: Perform a search with a non-existent farm/device name
Verify that a 'No results found' message is shown
Apply filters that exclude all farms/devices
Verify 'No matching items' feedback is displayed clearly

title: Floating UI tooltips and dropdowns positioning and responsiveness
description: Verify advanced tooltips and dropdown menus position correctly relative to triggers, adjusting for viewport edges and scrolling.

steps.description: Hover over UI elements with tooltips
Verify tooltips appear in correct positions without clipping
Open dropdown menus in various page locations
Verify dropdown menus reposition dynamically to remain fully visible
Resize window and scroll page
Verify tooltips and dropdowns recalculate positions accordingly

title: Logout and guest guard enforcement
description: Verify that logging out invalidates the session and guest guard prevents authenticated users from accessing login or register pages.

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials
Log out from the application
Verify user is redirected to login screen and session token is invalidated
Attempt to navigate to login or register page while logged in
Verify guest guard redirects authenticated user to dashboard

title: Responsive layout and UI on multiple screen sizes
description: Verify the application layout and UI components respond and adapt correctly on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes including language and theme changes.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop resolution
Verify layout and UI components display correctly without overflow or clipping
Resize window to tablet size
Verify layout adjusts properly and remains usable
Resize to mobile width or use mobile device
Verify UI is functional with accessible menus, buttons, and data display
Switch languages and theme while testing responsiveness
Verify no UI breakage and smooth transitions occur
